answers.answer: You started to what from head to toe?  I didn't understand that.What medication are you taking for the Diabetes?You still have your gallbladder?  Any history of problems with your liver?This does NOT sound like any Stomach or Bowel CA to me.

question: I am 39 years old and found out that my iron b12 is low again and i have diabeties aswell which blood was 5.7 so that is ok, but i have started to each from head to toe alot and also every time i have a meal i have to go toilet and very loose all the while and mucus aswell.  Can you give me any advice on this and also ease my mind that it's not stomach cancer or bowel cancer as my mum passed away with that and i do have bad stomach pains now and again. thankyou. alisan
title: vitamin b12 low
